glsa.title: Sendmail: Race condition in the handling of asynchronous signals
glsa.synopsis: Sendmail is vulnerable to a race condition which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code with sendmail privileges.

background.p: Sendmail is a popular mail transfer agent (MTA).

description.p: ISS discovered that Sendmail is vulnerable to a race condition in the handling of asynchronous signals.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this via certain crafted timing conditions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Sendmail users should upgrade to the latest version:
